title: HMD Fusion is getting a Venom Smart Outfit but you won’t be able to buy one
description: HMD began teasing a tie-in phone for the upcoming Venom: The Last Dance movie and we now get to see the actual product. It won’t be a limited-edition phone but a prototype Smart Outfit case that adds an electromagnetic liquid ferrofluid on the back as a nod to the Venom symbiote from the Marvel franchise. Once attached to the HMD Fusion, the Venom Smart Outfit will apply a custom theme, wallpapers which you can download from HMD’s press release here, and Venom alert sounds. HMD also revealed that the Venom Smart Outfit won’t be going on open sale which is a bummer. The brand is...

text: HMD began teasing a tie-in phone for the upcoming Venom: The Last Dance movie and we now get to see the actual product. It won’t be a limited-edition phone but a prototype Smart Outfit case that adds an electromagnetic liquid ferrofluid on the back as a nod to the Venom symbiote from the Marvel franchise. Once attached to the HMD Fusion, the Venom Smart Outfit will apply a custom theme, wallpapers which you can download from HMD’s press release here, and Venom alert sounds. HMD also revealed that the Venom Smart Outfit won’t be going on open sale which is a bummer. The brand is planning a wider rollout of its Smart Outfits for next year. Source
html:
HMD began teasing a tie-in phone for the upcoming Venom: The Last Dance movie and we now get to see the actual product.

It won’t be a limited-edition phone but a prototype Smart Outfit case that adds an electromagnetic liquid ferrofluid on the back as a nod to the Venom symbiote from the Marvel franchise. Once attached to the HMD Fusion, the Venom Smart Outfit will apply a custom theme, wallpapers which you can download from HMD’s press release here, and Venom alert sounds.

HMD also revealed that the Venom Smart Outfit won’t be going on open sale which is a bummer. The brand is planning a wider rollout of its Smart Outfits for next year.

Source
